body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#17550](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17550.html) (build: set minimum supported macOS to 10.12 by fanquake)
* [#17549](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17549.html) (ci: misc cleanups by MarcoFalke)
* [#17490](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17490.html) (ci: Add valgrind run by MarcoFalke)
* [#17402](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17402.html) (ci: Travis support for PowerPC64 by elichai)
* [#17376](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17376.html) (Add Parallel P2P Client in Rust by TheBlueMatt)
* [#17099](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17099.html) (depends: Eliminate hard dependency on Ubuntu-ABI specific clang by dongcarl)
* [#16834](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16834.html) (Fetch Headers over DNS by TheBlueMatt)
* [#16762](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16762.html) (Rust-based Backup over-REST block downloader by TheBlueMatt)
* [#16392](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16392.html) (build: macOS toolchain update by fanquake)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
